product_name: Mountain Hardwear Effusion Hooded Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The close-fitting, athletic Effusion Hooded Jacket from Mountain Hardwear is designed more like a running top than a rain jacket. It's waterproof, breathable and stretchy for strenuous activities. Fully waterproof, windproof, seam-taped construction keeps you dry and protected in rain, wind, sleet or snow. Super-lightweight 3-layer stretch knit keeps you comfortable during highly aerobic activities when breathability and stretch are just as important as waterproofness. Durable water repellent finish beads up precipitation so it rolls right off. Mountain Hardwear Effusion Hooded Jacket for women features a long-cut back for performance. Reflective trim increases your visibility in low light. Zippered pockets secure essentials. Closeout.
short_description: The close-fitting, athletic Effusion Hooded Jacket from Mountain Hardwear is designed more like a running top than a rain jacket. It's waterproof, breathable and stretchy for strenuous activities.
